data.name: 100% Orange Juice - Character Song Pack: Ultimate Weapon Girl
data.detailed_description: Prepare to die of cuteness overload! The first official Character Song Pack for 100% Orange Juice contains the Sham & Sora (Cuties) character song "Ultimate Weapon Girl" in 5 different versions!
data.about_the_game: Prepare to die of cuteness overload! The first official Character Song Pack for 100% Orange Juice contains the Sham & Sora (Cuties) character song "Ultimate Weapon Girl" in 5 different versions!
data.short_description: Prepared to die of cuteness overload! The first official Character Song Pack for 100% Orange Juice contains the Sham & Sora (Cuties) character song "Ultimate Weapon Girl" in 5 different versions!
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D compatible video card with 128MB memory or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
